GREETINGS.title: Greetings from Cubby!
GREETINGS.description: Ready to win some ASR points and more? See if you can complete our games for all 14 countries!

COMEBACK.title: Welcome back!
COMEBACK.description: Did you know you can earn more NFT lucky draw chances by replaying the countries?

VIETNAM.title: Welcome to Vietnam!
VIETNAM.description: The white sandy beaches and clear waters are never far when you’re at Nha Trang.

PHILIPPINES.title: Welcome to Philippines!
PHILIPPINES.description: Not only is Cebu its oldest city, it is also one of the world's best-preserved Spanish colonial towns.

INDONESIA.title: Welcome to Indonesia!
INDONESIA.description: Made up of over 17,000 islands, Bali is just one of the many picturesque islands here.

JAPAN.title: Welcome to Japan!
JAPAN.description: Savour the finer flavours of Fukuoka, one of the country’s best food cities and second only to Tokyo for the highest concentration of restaurants.

INDIA.title: Welcome to India!
INDIA.description: Explore the many ancient temples, vibrant arts and bustling culinary scene that makes Chennai, the capital of Tamil Nadu.

USA.title: Welcome to USA!
USA.description: Home to the 7th busiest subway system, New York has a whopping total of 472 train stations right now.

KOREA.title: Welcome to Korea!
KOREA.description: Its capital city, Seoul, is a wondrous blend of old and new, with high-tech districts amidst ancient palaces.

FRANCE.title: Welcome to France!
FRANCE.description: Come experience the Parisian life and wake up to views of the Eiffel Tower from a 5-star hotel.

THAILAND.title: Welcome to Thailand!
THAILAND.description: The popular Sriracha hot sauce was actually named after one of its seaside cities, Si Racha.

SINGAPORE.title: Welcome to Singapore!
SINGAPORE.description: From fine dining to hawker fare, Singapore is a food paradise that’s known for its culinary diversity.

AUSTRALIA.title: Welcome to Australia!
AUSTRALIA.description: With more than half of all Australians owning pets, Melbourne is the purfect place for you and your four-legged friend.

MALAYSIA.title: Welcome to Malaysia!
MALAYSIA.description: Here you’ll find the world's tallest twin skyscrapers in Kuala Lumpur, and beautiful mosques across the country.

CHINA.title: Welcome to China!
CHINA.description: Discover the grand Forbidden City and 3000 years of recorded history at the heart of Beijing.

DUBAI.title: Welcome to Dubai!
DUBAI.description: Did you know it was mostly a desert just 20 years ago? Today, it is filled with luxury shopping, modern architecture, and lively nightlife scenes.
